TargetName: Verify and embed program clarifications and special requirements into concept

Statement: This deliverable traces to OBJ-003: maximize proposed conceptual design score through clear functional concept and evidence of meeting OSR/program.
Notes: FACT: OBJ-003 confirmed in decomposition §6 Objectives table as mapped to DEL-02-01 via PKG-04.

Statement: This deliverable traces to OBJ-004: deliver strong Design Brief (durability maintainability operations-fit rationale); concept is the design foundation enabling DEL-02-02.

Statement: Functional Program (Appendix B of RFP) is an explicit required input for room list and program requirements before concept design work can proceed.
EvidenceQuote: Functional Program (Appendix B of RFP) — room list and program requirements
Notes: FACT: Procedure.md Prerequisites explicitly lists Appendix B as a required input. Specification.md R1 requires program fit verification against Appendix B (C-002 blocking conflict: location TBD — PDF access required).

TargetName: RFP Appendix A (Owner Statement of Requirements)
Statement: RFP Appendix A (OSR) is an explicit required input for owner objectives performance expectations and design constraints before concept design can proceed.
EvidenceQuote: Review RFP Appendix A (Owner Statement of Requirements) to extract: Project objectives and owner priorities
Notes: FACT: Procedure.md Step 1.2 explicitly requires review of RFP Appendix A. _REFERENCES.md lists RFP as applicable reference.

Statement: Addendum 03 is an explicit required input providing the 12-acre developable site constraint pickled sand storage removal and technical requirements (doors sumps exhaust generator fill stations solar).
EvidenceQuote: Addendum 03 ... Key content: 12-acre developable site, pickled sand storage removal, technical requirements
Notes: FACT: Procedure.md Prerequisites and Step 1.4 explicitly require review of Addendum 03. Requirements R3-R8 in Specification.md directly derive from Addendum 03.

Statement: Geotechnical Investigation Report is an explicit required input; concept design shall respond to site constraints identified in the report (Specification R14) affecting building placement and foundation approach.
EvidenceQuote: concept design shall respond to site constraints identified in the Geotechnical Investigation Report
Notes: FACT: Specification.md R14 and Procedure.md Step 1.5 both explicitly require this document as a prerequisite input.

Statement: Wetland Assessment is an explicit required input; concept design shall respond to site constraints identified in the report (Specification R14) affecting building placement and environmental compliance.
EvidenceQuote: concept design shall respond to site constraints identified in ... Wetland Assessment
Notes: FACT: Specification.md R14 and Procedure.md Step 1.5 both explicitly require this document as a prerequisite input.

Statement: Flood zone mapping is an explicit required input; Specification R2 requires overlay with flood zone mapping to verify building and site improvements are within the 12-acre developable area.
EvidenceQuote: Requires overlay with flood zone mapping (location TBD: AB-2024-07156-Penhold PSB_parcel flood zone.pdf)
Notes: FACT: Specification.md R2 verification explicitly requires this document. Procedure.md Step 2.1 requires delineation of flood fringe using flood zone mapping.

Statement: Concept design must align with design rationale durability strategy and materials approach described in Design Brief Narrative; the concept establishes the design foundation that DEL-02-02 must narrate.

Statement: Concept design must support solar-ready provisions and energy efficiency claims stated in DEL-02-03; roof form orientation and building envelope in this concept are the artifact consumed by DEL-02-03.
EvidenceQuote: DEL-02-03 (Sustainability & Energy Narrative): Concept must support solar-ready provisions and energy efficiency claims
Notes: FACT: Specification.md Interfaces table explicitly states this interface. Procedure.md Step 9.2 confirms cross-check with DEL-02-03 for solar-ready provisions.

Statement: Concept scope and technical requirements (building area structural system site development extent) are explicitly consumed by PKG-02 Financial Proposal team as the basis for cost estimates.
EvidenceQuote: PKG-02 (Financial Proposal): Concept scope and technical requirements inform cost estimates
Notes: FACT: Specification.md Interfaces table explicitly states this handover. Guidance.md §Cost Implications confirms concept directly informs PKG-02 (DEL-05-01/02/03).

Statement: Concept must respond to site conditions and constraints documented in PKG-09 due diligence deliverables (DEL-09-01 risk register DEL-09-02 site conditions summary).
